title: Level design errors in the Jill Of The Jungle series!
content:
Jill1
On the map level: You must collect 3 gems to get to the bonus room. You can to enter it, or you can just jump onto the roof of it and collect the jump-power! By doing this you can jump into the tower near level 7 (you will know what i mean if you played this game) that you normally can't enter!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Jump into the block two tiles from going off the top of the level AND YOU WILL BE STUCK INSIDE THE BLOCK!!!!![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] To get out of the block, just jump in the opposite direction of the direction you went to get in the block.
Jill2
In waterworld: Jump into the water fall and fal with it. You will be trapped under water and if you hit the "Drowning" part of trhe water, you will drown underwater.
in the world of eternal weirdness: In the green area, after collecting the jump-powers and the key, before/after you open the door to the bird-power, but before you turn into a bird, leave the elevators one tile high. Trust me, if you leave them this high when you have two jump-powers in your inventory you will be able to jump onto the platforms with no trouble! Ignore the one that gets you to the door to the bird power, just jump onto the three red blocks and then jump through the door! You will make it! after turning into a bird go backwards out of the green area. Because you left small openings with the elevators, you will go into the area leading to the green area![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] and if you return to the area where the start is (The start is blocked by the elevator so ignore it) and go through the small spaces you will go out side of the area your supposed to be trapped in![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] Don't go back in yet, fly around a bit. If you enter the area where you exit don't exit, but go out the other side and you will be on the OTHER SIDE of the building![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] now you can return to the exit, and exit as a bird.
Jill3
Castle: climb the red things and jump towards one of the walls stopping you from falling out of the castle hights. You will land right on top of it![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] If you land on the left one of the right tower and fall of it in a straight line, you will be trapped in between two parts of the castle![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-surprise.gif[/img] You can't jump high enough to get out, so you will either need to load an save game or exit your current game and start a new one.[img]http://images.ucomics.com/comics/ga/2005/ga050705.gif[/img]

title: Re: Level design errors in the Jill Of The Jungle series!
content:
Yes, I may take advantage of this as well, you found even more errors than I knew.

[quote]Quote:[hr]By doing this you can jump into the tower near level 7 (you will know what i mean if you played this game) that you normally can't enter!!! Jump into the block two tiles from going off the top of the level AND YOU WILL BE STUCK INSIDE THE BLOCK!!!!![hr][/quote]

This has to do with the clipping of Jills jump sprite, and the top of the level behaviour. You can do this on any place where there is a one tile gap between a block and the level top.

You can kill all the birds in level 1 with your knife.

If you're good, you can sometimes get an extra knife by shooting your knife and running around [Works best if you have 2 or 3 knives]

On any switch, if you flick it up and down real fast the ground goes all funny.

You can do level 6 without using a key, just make sure that you don't touch the right spot of floor near the rightmost falling wall.

In level 7 becoming a bird and going up near the end will open the door at the level bottom.

In level 10 you can jump up and flick a switch just as you enter.

In level 11 you can kill that fish in the water.

You can jump over the door in level 12 and see the level edge.

In the last level if you go to the bottom of the pit and look down, you can see level 2 underneath.

[quote]Quote:[hr]In waterworld: Jump into the water fall and fal with it. You will be trapped under water and if you hit the "Drowning" part of trhe water, you will drown underwater.[hr][/quote]

This is an oversight and only the top of the water is deadly, I didn't know about this.

[quote]Quote:[hr]in the world of eternal weirdness:[hr][/quote]

This is a good one. Do things right and you can kill 3 of the 4 frogs in the level, that bird that flips switches [very hard] and go all the way around the level. [Including that odd mushroom bit right at the right of the level.

In level 11 [demonic maze] if a boulder falls down a vine you're on, it will sit at the bottom not moving until you go down and touch it. [error in the boulders 'follow jill sorta' program]

[quote]Quote:[hr]Castle: climb the red things and jump towards one of the walls stopping you from falling out of the castle hights. You will land right on top of it![hr][/quote]

An error with the tile properties here, but an interesting one at that.

Level 2 contains the ending sequence of the game 'Onesious'

In the dam at the sstart you can get the bees to chase you from offscreen, a bird at the level bottom is stuck flying in one place in midair. You can also climb both of the waterfall block things near the frogs. When you become a bird you can go to the lava and reach the bottom of the level, and also destroy several bees nests on a platform in midair far away from everything.

In the aqueduct if you jump [and die] right you can see pillars underneath a stretch of water.

On the map if you follow the river, you CAN actually reach the end of it, it just takes about 2 minutes.

On level 8 the small red ball sometimes escapes at the beginning and flies around randomly.

You can kill the jellyfish in the jail.

In the pyramid you can get out of the pyramid as a bird, but you can't exit the level as one. You can also exit as a frog.

You can get all the keys in the dark forest [1 by dying and falling on it]

In the castle [1st part] near the end you can jump past the Jill sign as a frog and see a ceiling made of water. [from another part of the level]

In the second part if you have a slow computer, you can turn into a bird and Jill so fast [near the left of the level] that you overload the sprites and Jill goes to half speed.
A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: Re: Level design errors in the Jill Of The Jungle series!
content:
In the last level if you go to the bottom of the pit and look down, you can see level 2 underneath.

A lot of the levels link together like that. There's the area on the very left of Level 1 that's actually part of another level (7, I think - you get there in bird form); the Underground River level is underneath the Dark Forest... probably others that I've forgotten...


One rather nice glitch I noticed is during the ending sequence of Jill 1, in the mushroom grove. You know how it ends just before Jill gets that last apple? If you hold down the [right] key before she makes that last jump up, instead of jumping up she'll jump to the right, and then you have control of her! So then you can jump around the level-end point, and get the apple. Unfortunately you can't leave the grove, and I haven't been able to find a way to gain control any earlier than that.[hr]

RocketJess, blasting off again!
